page.title: 13Broadmoor Hospital,Crowthorn
page.content: {Broadmoor Hospital}for the Criminally Insane was established by the government in 1863. 190 acres of land were purchased for the 'Criminal Lunatic Asylum', a Chapel, housing for the staff, farm land and a school. {Broadmoor Primary School,}founded 1863 now takes less than half its pupils from the families of Broadmoor staff. The Hospital has a{Training School for nurses specialising in mental care {1985}has seen the start of{a hospital {rebuilding programme}which will result in improved conditions for patients. { The Hospital is supported by {'The League of Friends of Broadmoor'}a voluntary organisation which does much to assist patients and their families. Although many staff now live away from the estate the{Broadmoor Sports {and Social Club}is used by all and a close community spirit remains.
